name: AVAudioNode
desc: An object you use for audio generation, processing, or an I/O block.

items.name: typealias AVAudioNodeBus
items.desc: The index of a bus on an audio node.

items.name: func inputFormat(forBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioFormat
items.desc: Gets the input format for the bus you specify.

items.name: func name(forInputBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> String?
items.desc: Gets the name of the input bus you specify.

items.name: var numberOfInputs: Int
items.desc: The number of input busses for the node.

items.name: func outputFormat(forBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioFormat
items.desc: Retrieves the output format for the bus you specify.

items.name: func name(forOutputBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> String?
items.desc: Retrieves the name of the output bus you specify.

items.name: var numberOfOutputs: Int
items.desc: The number of output busses for the node.

items.name: func installTap(onBus: AVAudioNodeBus, bufferSize: AVAudioFrameCount, format: AVAudioFormat?, block: AVAudioNodeTapBlock)
items.desc: Installs an audio tap on a bus you specify to record, monitor, and observe the output of the node.

items.name: func removeTap(onBus: AVAudioNodeBus)
items.desc: Removes an audio tap on a bus you specify.

items.name: typealias AVAudioNodeTapBlock
items.desc: The block that receives copies of the output of an audio node.

items.name: var engine: AVAudioEngine?
items.desc: The audio engine that manages the node, if any.

items.name: var auAudioUnit: AUAudioUnit
items.desc: An audio unit object that wraps or underlies the implementation’s audio unit.

items.name: var latency: TimeInterval
items.desc: The processing latency of the node, in seconds.

items.name: var outputPresentationLatency: TimeInterval
items.desc: The maximum render pipeline latency downstream of the node, in seconds.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Clears a unit’s previous processing state.

items.name: typealias AVAudioNodeCompletionHandler
items.desc: A general callback handler for an audio node.
